post_content:

Rube Kroh Piedmont 350/25 -- SOLD --
Cy Seymour (Batting) SC 150/30 - [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
Fred Payne SC 350-460/30 - [NO LONGER FOR SALE]

If you want to purchase any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" for a specific card will get the card.  This post will secure that card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the email text.
3. Make payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
